sentence.idiomatic: I did a lot of investigating beforehand, so writing it was quite easy.
This time things went fairly smoothly, I'll be done in a little while.
When I started doing it didn't come very naturally; after doing it a while I got used to it.
Her writing is the best in the class. Every time we write a composition she gets the highest mark.
Your writing style is pretty good, it's just that the content of the article is too cliché.
Read more works by other authors, and your writing style will also become more smooth.
In this piece of literature, he depicted the changes in the female psychology very exquisitely.
Her skin is exquisite and smooth. You can't at all tell that she is already 40 years old.
The quality of this porcelain is exquisite. The color is bright, it is an absolute work of art.
Other people gave her a little praise, and she started to get narcissistic.
Don't keep on reveling in narcissistic fantasies. You have to face reality.
Ordinarily when I'm at home I like to put on some lively songs and be a little narcissistic.
What you wrote has nothing to do with the subject. It is clearly off topic.
Your composition is off topic, so the teacher didn't mark it.
Don't worry about the style of writing. The important thing is that you can't be off topic.
The overall objective for this year has already been realized. You've all worked hard.
He is in charge of the overall design of the stadium.
In the wake of high-speed economic development, people's standard of living in general has improved a lot.
In our profession, skill comes from practice. When one has done it a long time, one becomes proficient.
I don't have any kind of unique skill. The main thing is practice like this--practice makes perfect.
Isn't it said that practice makes perfect? You've done this kind of work for such a long time, how come you're getting slower and slower?
I don't really like watching long TV series. The plot is too elaborate.
Now the passport application procedures are a lot simpler. It's not as elaborate as it was before.
If you get rid of all of that elaborate protocol everyone will get along a lot more naturally.
This sentence is a little incoherent. It seems to be missing something.
After changing this paragraph it reads a lot more smoothly.
Your writing is very elegant, you used many idioms; however, some of the sentences are not very coherent.
Good morning, sir.
Ah, good morning. You wrote this article quite well. You brought travel and emotion together. How do you feel about it?
It came out quite naturally. I have to thank you for letting me freely express myself.

I can tell, your writing style is very fluid, very exquisite. But you write a bit too narcissistically, and go off topic some. Although you need character when you write, the needs of the reader are most important. When writing a travel article, you have to offer useful information.
So do I need to change the overall angle?
No. But specific content and word choice will need a lot of revision. You used too much ink on personal emotion. Like this, the article lacks objectivity in the basic information.
I noticed that too. But I can never find the right balance in the relationship between the two.
That's OK. It takes time. Practice makes perfect, right?
Then what do you think the ratio of personal feeling to objective information should be?

Don't put it into a ratio. You have to remember that your goal is to introduce this place, and to emphasize this place's tour value. No matter what angle you write from, you need to make that your starting point.
Oh, when you put it that way, I get it.

Also, don't let your wording get too detailed. This time you used too many modifiers. It's actually all saying the same thing, so it doesn't mean much. Many of the paragraphs need to be condensed some.
But sir, can't I preserve some of my own style?

Of course. But you need to pay attention to the things I said. In content, you can't be too singularly focused. You have to flesh it out more. Also, there are a few places in the article that don't read too smoothly. I'm not sure if you noticed. I circled them for you. Go back and fix them.
OK, I'll revise them right away. After listening to you for a bit, I'm a lot clearer now.
You have to pay attention to this in your future writing too.
OK. Thank you, sir. After I revise it I'll send it to you.
